name: places/ChIJi_5UmvdZwokRxaHTZPMh18g
formattedAddress: 353 W 48th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 353 W 48th St 4th Floor, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
Updating this review. I previously left a poor review because I had a bad experience in which Dr. Spiegel thought I started seeing him just to get his sign off on medical leave from work. I was having a hard time with a previous psychiatrist’s regimen and wasn’t sleeping. I wasn’t myself, I believed I needed time off to recalibrate, and was told by my boss that my situation qualified. In my desperation I began seeking a new psychiatrist to help me heal, while also exploring the time off option. I was lucky to encounter Dr. Spiegel. His help in the 3 sessions before he suspected I wasn’t sincerely seeking help (and just wanted a free vacation?) were unbelievably insightful. And to this day I am benefiting from what I learned in those sessions.

I apologize that I was so unwell at the time that I wrote a negative review, and truly forgot about it until now. I wasn’t doing well and I was hurt in being sent away. Your suspicions were valid, it’s just sad that you couldn’t see I was being sincere. If the team at casco bay medical wants me to remove this review let me know in the comments and I’ll remove.

originalText.text: Dr. Spiegel is kind, supportive, and a great listener that excels in his work. He worked with me to come up with a system that perfectly addressed my needs and concerns. His office staff is also personable and responsive. Rates are reasonable as well! Would highly recommend!

text.text: Dr. Spiegel is kind, supportive, and a great listener that excels in his work. He worked with me to come up with a system that perfectly addressed my needs and concerns. His office staff is also personable and responsive. Rates are reasonable as well! Would highly recommend!

originalText.text: Hello Mr. Jeremy Spiegel, I'm writing to info you that someone is using your address for a company named KanDelivery, they are using your address to promote job opportunities.  Unfortunately I fell for their add, as I'm looking for work in California, in a remote mail handler position.  I hope this information helps you.  Thank you for reading.  P.S. the website is KanDelivery.com
